name: JetBlack
description:
JetBlack is a 3D game in which you have to complete various levels of mazes, while collecting pick-ups.

Each level cannot be completed until all pick-ups have been collected.

You are timed on how fast you can complete each level, and if you make the 10 fastest times for that level you will be allowed to enter your name on that level's leaderboard.

There are 33 mazes in total. Of which 32 must be unlocked, by accumulating a certain amount of pick-ups.

All mazes have its' own leaderboard, and all unlocked levels can be chosen to be played from the menu.

NO Violence + NO Ads + NO In-App Purchases + No internet connection required.

A language select is now on the main menu. Languages currently supported are : English, Russian, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Indonesian, German, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, Italian, Turkish, Arabic, Punjabi, Dutch, Filipino, Danish and Polish.
